item.title: Ananya Panday Launches NIF Global in India
item.dc:creator: nifkondhwa@2026
item.description:
Pune, November 13, 2024 – Bollywood superstar and fashion icon Ananya Panday launched the New York Institute of Fashion (NIF […]

The post Ananya Panday Launches NIF Global in India appeared first on NIF Global Pune.
item.content:encoded:
Pune, November 13, 2024 – Bollywood superstar and fashion icon Ananya Panday launched the New York Institute of Fashion (NIF Global) in India at NCPA, Pune. As the Style Icon of the brand, Ananya inspired students from NIF Global centers across Pune and India through her master session, sharing insights on style, individuality,


 Mrs. Mamta Gautam, Centre Head of NIF Global Kondhwa, called the event “transformative,” while Director Mr. Vivek Gautam highlighted its impact on empowering students with industry insights. NIF Global, headquartered in Manhattan, New York, combines an internationally inspired curriculum with India’s creative culture, mentored by industry legends like Manish Malhotra and Gauri Khan.

and fashion.

The post Ananya Panday Launches NIF Global in India appeared first on NIF Global Pune.

item.title: NIF Kondhwa Bandra Thane X Dubai Fashion Week
item.dc:creator: nifkondhwa@2026
item.description:
Dubai Fashion Week is a global hub for style, innovation, and creativity, showcasing the best in fashion from around the […]

The post NIF Kondhwa Bandra Thane X Dubai Fashion Week appeared first on NIF Global Pune.
item.content:encoded:
Dubai Fashion Week is a global hub for style, innovation, and creativity, showcasing the best in fashion from around the world. This year, our students had the incredible opportunity to participate, presenting their designs on an international stage. Their collections reflected a blend of cultural heritage and contemporary trends, impressing industry professionals and fashion enthusiasts alike. Being part of such a prestigious event has been an invaluable experience, allowing them to gain exposure, network with top designers, and refine their craft. We are proud of their achievements and look forward to seeing their future contributions to the fashion industry.

The post NIF Kondhwa Bandra Thane X Dubai Fashion Week appeared first on NIF Global Pune.

item.title: NIF Global Students Shine at Kala Ghoda Arts Festival 2025
item.dc:creator: nifkondhwa@2026
item.description:
The Kala Ghoda Arts Festival (KGAF) is one of Pune’s most celebrated cultural events, bringing together art, design, and creativity […]

The post NIF Global Students Shine at Kala Ghoda Arts Festival 2025 appeared first on NIF Global Pune.
item.content:encoded:
The Kala Ghoda Arts Festival (KGAF) is one of Pune’s most celebrated cultural events, bringing together art, design, and creativity from across the country. This year, students from NIF Global Kondhwa Bandra Thane had the incredible opportunity to participate and showcase their talent through a thought-provoking installation.

Guided by expert mentors, our students conceptualized and executed a stunning installation that reflected the theme of sustainability and innovation. Their work, crafted with eco-friendly materials and bold design elements, captivated festival-goers and sparked meaningful conversations about the future of design.Participating in KGAF was not just about creativity but also about experiential learning—our students gained hands-on experience, networked with industry professionals, and witnessed how art can inspire change.

At NIF Global, we believe in nurturing young designers by giving them real-world exposure, and KGAF 2025 was a testament to their talent and dedication.

The post NIF Global Students Shine at Kala Ghoda Arts Festival 2025 appeared first on NIF Global Pune.
